actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To provide for the applicability of combat-related tax benefits to certain additional participants in the Persian Gulf conflict.

summary.text: States that, for purposes of the Internal Revenue Code, Persian Gulf conflict service shall be treated as service in a combat zone. Includes service performed in Diego Garcia in connection with Operation Desert Shield, Operation Desert Storm, or any related military operation as Persian Gulf service.

titles.title: To provide for the applicability of combat-related tax benefits to certain additional participants in the Persian Gulf conflict.
